response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at $9,500. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget and needs.", "product_price": 9500}
